pokemon.name: Bulbasaur
pokemon.notes: Your starter and first Pokédex entry!

pokemon.name: Ivysaur
pokemon.notes: Evolves at level 16

pokemon.name: Venusaur
pokemon.notes: Evolves at level 32

pokemon.name: Charmander
pokemon.notes: Your starter and first Pokédex entry!

pokemon.name: Charmeleon
pokemon.notes: Evolves at level 16

pokemon.name: Charizard
pokemon.notes: Evolves at level 32

pokemon.name: Squirtle
pokemon.notes: Your starter and first Pokédex entry!

pokemon.name: Wartortle
pokemon.notes: Evolves at level 16

pokemon.name: Blastoise
pokemon.notes: Evolves at level 32

pokemon.name: Caterpie
pokemon.notes: Catch in Viridian Forest. Also found in Route 25 and Pattern Bush.

pokemon.name: Metapod
pokemon.notes: Catch in Viridian Forest. Also found in Route 25 and Pattern Bush. Evolves at level 7.

pokemon.name: Butterfree
pokemon.notes: Must evolve from Metapod at level 10

pokemon.name: Weedle
pokemon.notes: Catch in Viridian Forest. Also found in Route 25 and Pattern Bush.

pokemon.name: Kakuna
pokemon.notes: Catch in Viridian Forest. Also found in Route 25 and Pattern Bush. Evolves at level 7.

pokemon.name: Beedrill
pokemon.notes: Must evolve from Kakuna at level 10

pokemon.name: Pidgey
pokemon.notes: Found in numerous routes

pokemon.name: Pidgeotto
pokemon.notes: Not as plentiful to catch in FireRed. Evolves at level 18.

pokemon.name: Pidgeot
pokemon.notes: Must evolve Pidgeotto at level 36

pokemon.name: Rattata
pokemon.notes: Found in numerous routes and the Pokémon Mansion

pokemon.name: Raticate
pokemon.notes: Catch on Route 17, 18, or the Pokémon Mansion. Evolves from Ratatta at level 20.

pokemon.name: Spearow
pokemon.notes: Found in numerous routes

pokemon.name: Fearow
pokemon.notes: Catch on Route 17, 18, 23, or many Sevii Island paths. Evolves from Spearow at level 20.

pokemon.name: Ekans
pokemon.notes: Found on Route 4, 8, 9, 10, 11, 22, and 23

pokemon.name: Arbok
pokemon.notes: Found on Route 23 and Victory Road. Evolves from Ekans at level 22.

pokemon.name: Pikachu
pokemon.notes: Found in Viridian Forest or the Power Plant

pokemon.name: Raichu
pokemon.notes: Evolve from Pikachu with a Thunder Stone (can buy in Celadon Store or find in the Power Plant)

pokemon.name: Nidoran♀
pokemon.notes: Trade a Nidoran♂ for one with an NPC on Route 5. Found on Route 3 (low encounter rate) and Safari Zone areas 1 (East) & 2 (North).

pokemon.name: Nidorina
pokemon.notes: Trade a Nidorino for one with an NPC on Route 11. Found in Safari Zone areas 1 (East) & 2 (North). Evolves from Nidoran♀ at level 16.

pokemon.name: Nidoqueen
pokemon.notes: Evolve from Nidorina with a Moon Stone

pokemon.name: Nidoran♂
pokemon.notes: Found on Route 3 and all Safari Zone areas

pokemon.name: Nidorino
pokemon.notes: Found in all Safari Zone areas. Evolves from Nidoran♂ at level 16.

pokemon.name: Nidoking
pokemon.notes: Evolve from Nidorino with a Moon Stone

pokemon.name: Clefairy
pokemon.notes: Found in Mt. Moon on the first floor or basement 2. They have a low encounter rate so a short grind may be needed to find one.

pokemon.name: Clefable
pokemon.notes: Evolve from Clefairy with a Moon Stone

pokemon.name: Jigglypuff
pokemon.notes: Found on Route 3

pokemon.name: Wigglytuff
pokemon.notes: Evolve from Jigglypuff with a Moon Stone

pokemon.name: Zubat
pokemon.notes: Plentiful! Name a cave and it is there!

pokemon.name: Golbat
pokemon.notes: Almost as plentiful as Zubat! Can also evolve from Zubat at level 22.

pokemon.name: Oddish
pokemon.notes: Found on many routes, starting from Route 5.

pokemon.name: Gloom
pokemon.notes: Found on Route 12, 13, 14, 15, and some Sevii Island areas. Evolves from Oddish at level 21.

pokemon.name: Vileplume
pokemon.notes: Evolve from Gloom with a Leaf Stone (can find in Safari Zone or buy from Celadon Store)

pokemon.name: Paras
pokemon.notes: Found in Mt. Moon (all floors) and most Safari Zone areas

pokemon.name: Parasect
pokemon.notes: Found in some Safari Zone areas and all Cerulean Cave floors. Evolve from Paras at level 24.

pokemon.name: Venonat
pokemon.notes: Found on Route 12, 13, 14, 15, Safari Zone Area 3 (East) and Central Area, and some Sevii Island areas

pokemon.name: Venomoth
pokemon.notes: Found in most Safari Zone areas and Berry Forest. Evolve from Venonat at level 31.

pokemon.name: Diglett
pokemon.notes: Found in Diglett Cave

pokemon.name: Dugtrio
pokemon.notes: Found in Diglett Cave. Evolve from Diglett at level 26.

pokemon.name: Meowth
pokemon.notes: Found on Route 5, 6, 7, 8, and most Sevii Island areas

pokemon.name: Persian
pokemon.notes: Found in most Sevii Island areas. Evolve from Meowth at level 28.

pokemon.name: Psyduck
pokemon.notes: Found on many routes via Surfing

pokemon.name: Golduck
pokemon.notes: Found in all Seafoam Island floors, Cerulean Cave Floor 1 and Basement 1, and a couple Sevii Island areas. Evolve from Psyduck at level 33.

pokemon.name: Mankey
pokemon.notes: Found on Route 3, 4, 22, 23, and Rock Tunnel

pokemon.name: Primeape
pokemon.notes: Found on Route 23, Victory Road Floor 2, and Cerulean Cave Floor 1. Evolve from Mankey at level 28.

pokemon.name: Growlithe
pokemon.notes: Found on Route 7, 8, and all Pokémon Mansion floors

pokemon.name: Arcanine
pokemon.notes: Evolve from Growlithe with a Fire Stone (can find in Mt. Ember or buy from Celadon Store).

pokemon.name: Poliwag
pokemon.notes: Found by fishing with Good or Super Rod in many locations

pokemon.name: Poliwhirl
pokemon.notes: Found by fishing with the Super Rod in many locations. Evolve from Poliwag at level 25.

pokemon.name: Poliwrath
pokemon.notes: Evolve from Poliwhirl with a Water Stone (can find in Seafoam Islands or buy from Celadon Store).

pokemon.name: Abra
pokemon.notes: Found on Route 24 and 25. They only know Teleport so you must catch or status effect on the first round.

pokemon.name: Kadabra
pokemon.notes: Found in Cerulean Cave Floor 2 or Basement 1. Evolve from Abra at level 16.

pokemon.name: Machop
pokemon.notes: Found in Mt. Ember, Rock Tunnel, and Victory Road

pokemon.name: Machoke
pokemon.notes: Found in Mt. Ember, Victory Road, and Cerulean Cave. Evolve from Machop at level 28.

pokemon.name: Tentacool
pokemon.notes: Plentiful! If you can Surf, you will find one!

pokemon.name: Tentacruel
pokemon.notes: Plentiful on Sevii Island's Surfing paths! Evolve from Tentacool at level 30.

pokemon.name: Geodude
pokemon.notes: Found in Mt. Moon, Rock Tunnel, Cerulean Cave, and Sevii Island caves. Also randomly spawn from Rock Smashing rocks.

pokemon.name: Graveler
pokemon.notes: Found in the same areas as Geodude. Evolve from Geodude at level 25.

pokemon.name: Ponyta
pokemon.notes: Found on Kindle Road or Mt. Ember

pokemon.name: Rapidash
pokemon.notes: Found on Kindle Road or Mt. Ember. Evolve from Ponyta at level 40.

pokemon.name: Magnemite
pokemon.notes: Found in the Power Plant

pokemon.name: Magneton
pokemon.notes: Found in the Power Plant and Cerulean Cave. Evolve from Magnemite at level 30.

pokemon.name: Farfetch'd
pokemon.notes: Trade a Spearow for one with an NPC in Vermillion City

pokemon.name: Doduo
pokemon.notes: Found on Route 16, 17, 18, and in most Safari Zone areas

pokemon.name: Dodrio
pokemon.notes: Evolve a Doduo at level 31

pokemon.name: Seel
pokemon.notes: Found in all Seafoam Island floors and Icefall Cave floor 1/basement 1 as random encounters or during Surfing

pokemon.name: Dewgong
pokemon.notes: Found in Seafoam Island basement 3 & 4 and Icefall Cave floor 1/basement 1. Evolve from Seel at level 34.

pokemon.name: Grimer
pokemon.notes: Rare encounters in Pokémon Mansion or Celadon City Super Rod fishing

pokemon.name: Muk
pokemon.notes: Evolve from Grimer at level 38

pokemon.name: Shellder
pokemon.notes: Found in Pallet Town, S.S. Anne, Cinnabar Island, and some Sevii Island locations via fishing with Super Rod

pokemon.name: Cloyster
pokemon.notes: Evolve from Shellder with a Water Stone (can find in Seafoam Islands or buy from Celadon Store)

pokemon.name: Gastly
pokemon.notes: Found in Pokémon Tower and Lost Cave

pokemon.name: Haunter
pokemon.notes: Found in Pokémon Tower and Lost Cave. Evolve from Gastly at level 25.

pokemon.name: Onix
pokemon.notes: Found in Rock Tunnel, Victory Road, and Sevault Canyon

pokemon.name: Drowzee
pokemon.notes: Found on Route 11 and Berry Forest

pokemon.name: Hypno
pokemon.notes: Found in Berry Forest. Evolve from Drowzee at level 26.

pokemon.name: Krabby
pokemon.notes: Lots of routes and towns have them via fishing with the Good Rod at a lower (but not awful) encounter rate

pokemon.name: Kingler
pokemon.notes: Evolve from Krabby at level 28

pokemon.name: Voltorb
pokemon.notes: Found on Route 10 and the Power Plant (fake Pokéballs and random encounters)

pokemon.name: Electrode
pokemon.notes: Found in Cerulean Cave Floors 1 and 2 or Basement 1. Evolve from Voltorb at level 30.

pokemon.name: Exeggcute
pokemon.notes: Found in all Safari Zone areas and Berry Forest

pokemon.name: Exeggutor
pokemon.notes: Evolve from Exeggcute with a Leaf Stone (can find in Safari Zone or buy in Celadon Store).

pokemon.name: Cubone
pokemon.notes: Found in Pokémon Tower and Sevault Canyon

pokemon.name: Marowak
pokemon.notes: Found in Victory Road and Sevault Canyon. Evolve from Cubone at level 28.

pokemon.name: Hitmonlee
pokemon.notes: Choose either this or Hitmonchan after completing the Karate Dojo. Otherwise, you must evolve it from Tyrogue at level 20.

pokemon.name: Hitmonchan
pokemon.notes: Choose either this or Hitmonchan after completing the Karate Dojo. Otherwise, you must evolve it from Tyrogue at level 20.

pokemon.name: Lickitung
pokemon.notes: Trade a Golduck for one with an NPC at Route 18's gate

pokemon.name: Koffing
pokemon.notes: Found in Pokémon Mansion and rarely while Surfing in Celadon City

pokemon.name: Weezing
pokemon.notes: Found in Pokémon Mansion (rare encounter). Evolves from Koffing at level 35.

pokemon.name: Rhyhorn
pokemon.notes: Found in Safari Zone Area 2 (North) and Center Area

pokemon.name: Rhydon
pokemon.notes: Evolve from Rhyhorn at level 42

pokemon.name: Chansey
pokemon.notes: Found in Safari Zone Area 2 (North) at a 4% encounter rate and Center Area at a 1% encounter rate. Getting the achievement by catching this will help prep your strategy for Tauros and Kangaskhan as well. I used Bait once and Rock once or twice before throwing a ball to do this catch.

pokemon.name: Tangela
pokemon.notes: Trade a Venonat for one with an NPC at Cinnabar Island's Lab. Found on Route 21 and Treasure Beach.

pokemon.name: Kangaskhan
pokemon.notes: Found in Safari Zone Area 1 (East) at a 4% encounter rate and Area 3 (West) at a 1% encounter rate.

pokemon.name: Horsea
pokemon.notes: Found in Seafoam Island with Surfing and are plentiful throughout the world with fishing using Super and Good Rods

pokemon.name: Seadra
pokemon.notes: Found with Super Rod fishing (rare encounter). Evolve from Horsea at level 32.

pokemon.name: Goldeen
pokemon.notes: Found with Super Rod fishing in Fuchsia City and Safari Zone (common encounter). Found with Good Rod fishing (uncommon encounter) in many locations.

pokemon.name: Seaking
pokemon.notes: Found with Super Rod fishing in Fuchsia City, Safari Zone, and Berry Forest. Evolve from Goldeen at level 33.

pokemon.name: Mr. Mime
pokemon.notes: Trade an Abra for one with an NPC in a house on Route 2

pokemon.name: Scyther
pokemon.notes: Found in Safari Zone Area 1 (East) at a 1% encounter rate and Center Area at a 4% encounter rate. Alternatively (and perhaps preferably), purchase it from Celadon Game Center for 5500 coins (or P¥110,000).

pokemon.name: Jynx
pokemon.notes: Trade a Poliwhirl for one in Cerulean City

pokemon.name: Electabuzz
pokemon.notes: Found in the Power Plant

pokemon.name: Tauros
pokemon.notes: Found in Safari Zone Area 2 (North) at a 1% encounter rate and Area 3 (West) at a 4% encounter rate.

pokemon.name: Magikarp
pokemon.notes: Plentiful! Just fish with the Old Rod!

pokemon.name: Gyarados
pokemon.notes: Found in numerous locations with Super Rod fishing. Evolve from Magikarp at level 20.

pokemon.name: Lapras
pokemon.notes: Obtain from NPC in Silph Co. after Rival Battle

pokemon.name: Ditto
pokemon.notes: Found on Route 13, 14, 15, Pokémon Mansion Basement, and all Cerulean Cave floors

pokemon.name: Eevee
pokemon.notes: Given to you in Celadon Mansion

pokemon.name: Vaporeon
pokemon.notes: Breed spare Eevees and use a Water Stone (found in Seafoam Island or buy in Celadon Store)

pokemon.name: Jolteon
pokemon.notes: Breed spare Eevees and use a Thunder Stone (found in the Power Plant or buy in Celadon Store)

pokemon.name: Flareon
pokemon.notes: Breed spare Eevees and use a Fire Stone (found on Mt. Ember or buy in Celadon Store)

pokemon.name: Porygon
pokemon.notes: Buy with 9999 Celadon Game Center coins. Convert P¥199,000 to 9950 Coins in the Game Center. You will have to actually play the slots to get to maximum of 9999 coins so save prior to playing.

pokemon.name: Omanyte
pokemon.notes: Revive Helix Fossil at Cinnabar Island's Lab

pokemon.name: Kabuto
pokemon.notes: Revive Dome Fossil at Cinnabar Island's Lab

pokemon.name: Omastar
pokemon.notes: Evolve from Omanyte at level 40

pokemon.name: Kabutops
pokemon.notes: Evolve from Kabuto at level 40

pokemon.name: Aerodactyl
pokemon.notes: Revive from the Old Amber at Cinnabar Island's Lab

pokemon.name: Snorlax
pokemon.notes: Battle and catch on either Route 12 or 16. These are the only two chances that you have!

pokemon.name: Articuno
pokemon.notes: Battle and catch in Seafoam Island. This is the only shot you have!

pokemon.name: Zapdos
pokemon.notes: Battle and catch in the Power Plant. This is the only shot you have!

pokemon.name: Moltres
pokemon.notes: Battle and catch on Mt. Ember. This is the only shot you have!

pokemon.name: Dratini
pokemon.notes: All Safari Zone areas with Super Rod fishing (uncommon encounter)

pokemon.name: Dragonair
pokemon.notes: All Safari Zone areas with Super Rod fishing (rare encounter). Evolve from Dratini at level 30 (much better than trying to catch one in Safari Zone...)

pokemon.name: Dragonite
pokemon.notes: Evolve from Dragonair at level 55

pokemon.name: Mewtwo
pokemon.notes: Cerulean Cave Basement. Recommend NOT using the Master Ball!! Bring a party that can put on a status effect (between Mewtwo's Safeguards) and a TON of Ultra Balls. You can use Timer Balls from Two Island's shop when the battle has dragged on for a long while.

pokemon.name: Sentret
pokemon.notes: Found in Canyon Entrance, Five Island Meadow, or Water Path

pokemon.name: Furret
pokemon.notes: Evolve from Sentret at level 15

pokemon.name: Ledyba
pokemon.notes: Found in Pattern Bush

pokemon.name: Ledian
pokemon.notes: Evolve from Ledyba at level 18

pokemon.name: Spinarak
pokemon.notes: Found in Pattern Bush

pokemon.name: Ariados
pokemon.notes: Evolve from Spinarak at level 22

pokemon.name: Crobat
pokemon.notes: Evolve from Golbat with high Friendship (Soothe Bell will help expedite raising Friendship)

pokemon.name: Pichu
pokemon.notes: Breed a Pikachu/Raichu at the Four Island Day Care

pokemon.name: Cleffa
pokemon.notes: Breed a Clefairy/Clefable at the Four Island Day Care

pokemon.name: Igglybuff
pokemon.notes: Breed a Jigglypuff/Wigglytuff at the Four Island Day Care

pokemon.name: Togepi
pokemon.notes: Obtain an egg from the Gentleman at Water Labyrinth

pokemon.name: Togetic
pokemon.notes: Evolve from Togepi with high Friendship (Soothe Bell will help expedite raising Friendship)

pokemon.name: Natu
pokemon.notes: Found in Ruin Valley

pokemon.name: Xatu
pokemon.notes: Evolve from Natu at level 25

pokemon.name: Bellossom
pokemon.notes: Evolve from Gloom with a Sun Stone (found in Ruin Valley)

pokemon.name: Hoppip
pokemon.notes: Found while Surfing around Sevii Island areas or in grass in Five Isle Meadow and Memorial Pillar

pokemon.name: Skiploom
pokemon.notes: Evolve from Hoppip at level 18

pokemon.name: Jumpluff
pokemon.notes: Evolve from Skiploom at level 27

pokemon.name: Yanma
pokemon.notes: Found in Ruin Valley

pokemon.name: Wooper
pokemon.notes: Found while Surfing around Four Island and Icefall Cave Entrance or in grass and surf in Ruin Valley

pokemon.name: Quagsire
pokemon.notes: Evolve from Wooper at level 20

pokemon.name: Murkrow
pokemon.notes: Found in Lost Cave (higher encounter rate in item rooms)

pokemon.name: Unown
pokemon.notes: Found in the various chambers of Tanoby Ruins once the puzzle is solved in the Sevault Canyon cave

pokemon.name: Wobbuffet
pokemon.notes: Found in Ruin Valley and all Cerulean Cave floors

pokemon.name: Dunsparce
pokemon.notes: Found in Three Isle Port

pokemon.name: Qwilfish
pokemon.notes: Fish with the Super Rod in Sevii Island areas

pokemon.name: Heracross
pokemon.notes: Found in Pattern Bush

pokemon.name: Slugma
pokemon.notes: Found in Mt. Ember cave basements or as a common random Rock Smash encounter in Mt. Ember basement 3

pokemon.name: Magcargo
pokemon.notes: Found in Mt. Ember basement 3 as a rare random Rock Smash encounter. Evolve from Slugma at level 38.

pokemon.name: Swinub
pokemon.notes: Found in Icefall Cave

pokemon.name: Piloswine
pokemon.notes: Evolve from Swinub at level 33

pokemon.name: Delibird
pokemon.notes: Found in Icefall Cave

pokemon.name: Skarmory
pokemon.notes: Found in Sevault Canyon

pokemon.name: Phanpy
pokemon.notes: Found in Sevault Canyon and Canyon Entrance

pokemon.name: Donphan
pokemon.notes: Evolve from Phanpy at level 25

pokemon.name: Tyrogue
pokemon.notes: Breed from the Fighting Dojo Pokémon

pokemon.name: Hitmontop
pokemon.notes: Evolve from Tyrogue at level 20

pokemon.name: Smoochum
pokemon.notes: Breed a Jynx at the Four Island Day Care

pokemon.name: Elekid
pokemon.notes: Breed a Electabuzz at the Four Island Day Care

pokemon.name: Blissey
pokemon.notes: Evolve from Chansey with high Friendship (Soothe Bell will help expedite raising friendship)

pokemon.name: Raikou
pokemon.notes: Wild encounter in Kanto after first Elite Four victory and receiving National Dex. The Pokémon faced depends on the chosen starter.

pokemon.name: Entei
pokemon.notes: Wild encounter in Kanto after first Elite Four victory and receiving National Dex. The Pokémon faced depends on the chosen starter.

pokemon.name: Suicune
pokemon.notes: Wild encounter in Kanto after first Elite Four victory and receiving National Dex. The Pokémon faced depends on the chosen starter.

pokemon.name: Larvitar
pokemon.notes: Found in Sevault Canyon

pokemon.name: Pupitar
pokemon.notes: Evolve from Larvitar at level 30

pokemon.name: Tyranitar
pokemon.notes: Evolve from Pupitar at level 55

pokemon.name: Wynaut
pokemon.notes: Breed Wobbuffet that holds Lax Incense at the Four Island Day Care
